import React from 'react' import products from '../products' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { Row, Col, Image, Card, Button, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' const Productscreen = () => { const Product = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back alt={product.name}

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Description : {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ) } } export default Productscreen
